// src/components/Sidebar.js import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import 'bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css'; const Sidebar = ({ stats, categories }) => { const [isExpanded, setIsExpanded] = useState(false); const toggleSidebar = () => { setIsExpanded(!isExpanded); }; return (

Hello

  • Create New Task View All User Tasks
Categories
  • Total Tasks    {stats.total}
    • {categories.map(category => (
  • {category.name}
    • ))}
Status
  •  Finished   {stats.completed}
  •  Pending   {stats.pending}
Priority
  •  High Priority   {stats.high}
  •  Medium Priority   {stats.medium}
  •  Low Priority   {stats.low}
); }; export default Sidebar;
